title: Devi Torana Haaram - Elegant Gold and Diamond Necklace with Emerald Accent
materials: and a central Emerald gemstone. Gold is hallmarked for purity.
features: Features a unique torana-inspired (gateway) design, adorned with intricately set CZ stones. The pendant showcases a floral motif, culminating in delicate gold bead droplets. The Haaram band itself is embellished with floral engravings and interspersed CZ stones. The setting is meticulously crafted to maximize the brilliance of each stone.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white CZ stones. A vibrant green Emerald stone provides a stunning focal point.
occasions: and other special celebrations. Its modern design also lends itself to contemporary occasions and formal events.
description: This Devi Torana Haaram represents the epitome of modern South Indian jewelry. The combination of traditional design elements with a contemporary aesthetic makes it a truly unique piece. The brilliance of the CZ stones mirrors the radiance of the wearer. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and ensures its lasting beauty. The emerald adds a touch of regal elegance.
